price: Associam-Lhe os que nada criam, enquanto eles mesmos são criados?
arabic: أَيُشۡرِكُونَ مَا لَا يَخۡلُقُ شَيۡـٔٗا وَهُمۡ يُخۡلَقُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: ayush'rikūna mā lā yakhluqu shayan wahum yukh'laqūna
